trans-unit.source: Opens an existing named semaphore object

target.mrk: Opens an existing named semaphore object

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: The name of the semaphore to be opened. Name comparisons are case sensitive.

seg-source.mrk: The name of the semaphore to be opened.
Name comparisons are case sensitive.

target.mrk: The name of the semaphore to be opened.
Name comparisons are case sensitive.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The access to the semaphore object. The function fails if the security descriptor of the specified

The access to the semaphore object.
The function fails if the security descriptor of the specified

target.mrk: [optional]
The access to the semaphore object.
The function fails if the security descriptor of the specified

trans-unit.source: object does not permit the requested access for the calling process.

seg-source.mrk: object does not permit the requested access for the calling process.

target.mrk: object does not permit the requested access for the calling process.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be one of the following values.

seg-source.mrk: This parameter can be one of the following values.

target.mrk: This parameter can be one of the following values.

trans-unit.source: $SEMAPHORE_ALL_ACCESS (Default)

trans-unit.source: $SEMAPHORE_MODIFY_STATE

target.mrk: $SEMAPHORE_MODIFY_STATE

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies whether inherites the handle by a processes, valid values:

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
Specifies whether inherites the handle by a processes, valid values:

target.mrk: [optional]
Specifies whether inherites the handle by a processes, valid values:

trans-unit.source: True - The processes created by this process will inherit the handle.

seg-source.mrk: True - The processes created by this process will inherit the handle.

target.mrk: True - The processes created by this process will inherit the handle.

trans-unit.source: False - The processes do not inherit this handle (Default).

seg-source.mrk: False - The processes do not inherit this handle (Default).

target.mrk: False - The processes do not inherit this handle (Default).

trans-unit.source: The function succeeds only if some process has already created the semaphore by using the _WinAPI_CreateSemaphore()
